meanings.definition: A device used to measure the rate of evaporation of water.
meanings.sent1: The atmometers in the garden help us track how fast the water is disappearing.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use atmometers to study how quickly water turns into vapor.
meanings.sent3: The atmometers had a race to see which one could measure the evaporation first!
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like atmometers, absorbing every detail of the scenery.
meanings.sent5: The atmometers hummed softly as they diligently recorded the water loss.
